ComicInfo.Summary:
Garden of Eden, Part 6: Worms!: Dare's ship is invaded by alien worms.
Inferno, Part 37: The Hellcats have to face off against the Wolves of Death with Giant's life at stake.
The Cursed Earth, Part 12: Burger Law!: Dredd and Spikes are dragged into MacDonald's town.
Ant Wars, Part 2: The giant ants are heading for the nearest town.
Cousin George, Part 8: Zero brings the house down.
